name: electrostatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is caused by electricity that does not move in a current but is attracted to the surface of some objects: electrostatically charged The machines broke down after they became electrostatically charged and dust collected in them. This toxin is capable of binding electrostatically to DNA. Related word
electrostatic
More examplesFewer examplesThe air seems to become electrostatically charged.The machine electrostatically filters dust from the air.The coating is applied electrostatically to create a hard finish on metal.Small droplets of ink are sprayed electrostatically onto the paper.The dressing binds electrostatically to the wound, by producing a positive charge.
